Plugin Name	: Tiny Carousel Horizontal Slider Plus
Plugin URI	: http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2014/06/06/tiny-carousel-horizontal-slider-plus-wordpress-plugin/
Author		: Gopi Ramasamy
Author URI	: http://www.gopiplus.com
License		: GPLv2 or later
License URI	: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
 
********************************Version 1.0************************************************************

First version.

This is Jquery based image horizontal slider plugin, it is using tiny carousel light weight jquery script to the slideshow.

********************************Version 1.1************************************************************

1. Bug in the image link has been fixed.

********************************Version 1.2************************************************************

1. Issue on random image display has been fixed.
2. Link target option has been added on admin image management page. With this option you can specifies where to open the link.

********************************Version 1.3************************************************************

Tested up to 4.0

********************************Version 1.4************************************************************

* Tested up to 4.1

********************************Version 1.5************************************************************=

1. Tested up to 4.2.2

********************************Version 1.6************************************************************

Image upload option is added in the plugin admin. With this option you can easily upload (or select from media) your images into this plugin.

********************************Version 1.7************************************************************

1. Tested up to 4.3

********************************Version 1.8************************************************************

1. Tested up to 4.4

********************************Version 1.9************************************************************

1. Tested up to 4.5
2. Sanitization added for all input value.

********************************Version 2.0************************************************************

1. Tested up to 4.6

********************************Version 2.1************************************************************

1. Tested up to 4.7

********************************Version 2.2************************************************************

1. Tested up to 4.8

********************************Version 2.3************************************************************

1. Tested up to 4.9

********************************Version 2.4************************************************************

1. Tested up to 5.0
2. Converted JS alert message into WP class file.

********************************Version 2.5************************************************************

1. Tested up to 5.1
